content: एतावत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} So much, so great, so many, of such extent, so far, of such quality or kind; एतावदुक्त्वा विरते मृगेंद्रे <ls>R. 2. 51</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 89</ls>; एतावान्मे विभवो भवंतं सेवितुं <ls>M. 2</ls> so far; <ab>oft.</ab> used in connection with a relative pronoun which generally follows; एतावता नन्वनुमेयशोभि… आरोपितं यद्गिरिशेन पश्चादंकं <ls>Ku. 1. 37.</ls> {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} So far, so much, in such a degree, thus.
